verses.roman:
ṭhākura kahe,--"aiche vāt kahite nā yuyāya
āmi--nīca-jāti, tumi--susajjana rāya"

synonyms: ṭhākura kahe—Jhaḍu Ṭhākura said; aiche vāt—such a request; kahite nā yuyāya—should not be spoken; āmi—I; nīca-jāti—coming from a family of a very low caste; tumi—you; su-sat-jana rāya—very respectable and rich gentleman.
translation: Jhaḍu Ṭhākura replied, "It does not befit you to ask this of me. I belong to a very low-caste family, whereas you are a respectable rich gentleman."
